Articles.Content:
2.5 - Updated for 1.0.x + PDFs

I struggled a bit to start with playing KSP getting all the right keystrokes and stuff, and recalled some old games that had "Maps" for what keys to worry about. Knocked most of this together learning vector drawing for my plugin, but realised it might be useful for others (so I added some fancy headings ).

Woo Hoo, this is great! It's a little sad that this method of "quick learning" the game have faded away, I always liked densely packed information. Even if you didn't remember all of the keys you at least got a clue of what could be done. And after one reading of such map you could skip tutorial/manual and go into action right away . Now days I'm happy when we get both keyboard and mouse controls in one game :|.

Hehe, i think i still remember around 90-95% of keyboard shortcuts for F/A:18 3.0, and it was like 150 of them

More OT, It would be nice to add small things like, shift + space for jumping on a ladder or double click a window for zoom in.
